control.name: Ensure that sensitive data is not commited to the repository
control.desc: Create the mechanisms to ensure that sensitive data, such personal data or credentials is not uploaded to a repository. There are different ways to implement it. One of them is with the git pre-commit hooks, this way is described in the references.

reference.name: Preventing AWS credential leaks in Git with pre-commit
Prevents you from committing secrets and credentials into git repositories

test.steps: Check that there is not any sensitive data in the code from a repository.
